dublin_core.dcvalue: Endometrial carcinoma of endometrioid histology is frequently preceded by endometrial hyperplasia from which localized premalignant lesions called endometrial intraepithelial neoplasia EIN emerge Diagnostic criteria for EIN have been developed by histopathologic correlation with clinical outcome molecular changes and objective computerized histomorphometry However several benign mimics of EIN continue to cause diagnostic confusion
Archives of pathology And laboratory medicine
International Internet-based assessment of observer variability for diagnostically challenging endometrial biopsies.
